problems.title: Find the Shortest Superstring (Bit Manipulation)
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given an array of strings words, return the smallest string that contains each string in words as a substring. If there are multiple valid strings of the smallest length, return any of them.
You may assume that no string in words is a substring of another string in words.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
alex
loves
leetcode

Sample Output
alexlovesleetcode

Explanation: All permutations of "alex","loves","leetcode" would also be accepted.

Sample Input
catg
ctaagt
gcta
ttca
atgcatc

Sample Output
gctaagttcatgcatc

Explanation: This is one possible shortest superstring.
problems.constraints:
1 <= words.length <= 12
1 <= words[i].length <= 20
words[i] consists of lowercase English letters.
All the strings of words are unique.
hintsList: Use dynamic programming with bitmask to track which words have been used.
Precompute the overlap between pairs of words to optimize the solution.
